column4: so if im using VLC player on kubuntu..and foiund a bug on vlc, well that same bug be on ubuntu and linux mint?
and as a developer to fix that bug do they have to fix it for all distros?
basically im trying to see if their is a linux os more stable than the other
You can chack launchpad.ore to either report the bug or see if there's a work-around/fix for it.
